citations.narrative:
The licensee exhibits and breeds fennec foxes as part of the regulated business. However, exotic and wild canids were
not listed or approved on the application for a license. Accurate information must be provided in the application so the
inspector can ensure compliance with the appropriate regulations and standards prior to the applicant being issued a
license by USDA APHIS. Immediately cease any regulated activities with exotic and wild canids, including selling foxes
and any offspring resulting from breeding of foxes. Reapply for a new license and list exotic and wild felids on the
application if regulated activity will be conducted in the future with foxes or any other species of exotic and wild canids.

Acquisition records for three fox kits did not exist. Accurate recordkeeping is important for animal traceability in the event
of disease outbreaks or animal theft or loss. Correct by updating and maintaining records to accurately and completely
capture animal acquisition and disposition information.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee exhibits and breeds fennec foxes as part of the regulated business. However, exotic and wild canids were 
not listed or approved on the application for a license. Accurate information must be provided in the application so the 
inspector can ensure compliance with the appropriate regulations and standards prior to the applicant being issued a 
license by USDA APHIS. Immediately cease any regulated activities with exotic and wild canids, including selling foxes 
and any offspring resulting from breeding of foxes. Reapply for a new license and list exotic and wild felids on the 
application if regulated activity will be conducted in the future with foxes or any other species of exotic and wild canids. 
2.75(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Acquisition records for three fox kits did not exist. Accurate recordkeeping is important for animal traceability in the event 
of disease outbreaks or animal theft or loss. Correct by updating and maintaining records to accurately and completely 
capture animal acquisition and disposition information. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
